Sequence Information.Source: Bacillus thuringiensis subsp. kurstaki strain BUPM4
Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the class IId bacteriocin
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Structure Description: No proteins were shown to have similar sequences in either their N-terminal regions or any other region.
Sequence Information.Comments: This bacteriocin was heat-stable up to 70 degrees C and resisted up to pH 3.0. Bacthuricin F4 was sensitive to proteases demonstrating its proteinaceous nature.

Literature.Title: Purification, amino acid sequence and characterization of Bacthuricin F4, a new bacteriocin produced by Bacillus thuringiensis.
Literature.Author: Kamoun F, Mejdoub H, Aouissaoui H, Reinbolt J, Hammami A, Jaoua S.
